abstract: West Virginia rallies in fourth quarter to defeat Rutgers, 41-31, in college football.
snippet: West Virginia, which is leaving the league, rallied in the fourth quarter for a snowy victory over the Scarlet Knights.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey

lead_paragraph: West Virginia, which is leaving the league, rallied in the fourth quarter for a snowy victory over the Scarlet Knights.

headline.main: With the Big East Teetering, Rutgers Stumbles
